name: Syphon Filter: Dark Mirror
summary: Syphon Filter: Dark Mirror is a third-person shooter stealth video game developed by SCE Bend Studio and published by Sony Computer Entertainment for PlayStation Portable and PlayStation 2. It is the fifth game in the Syphon Filter series.
info:
• 中文名: 虹吸战士：黑镜
  • 开发: Bend Studio
  • 发行: Sony Interactive Entertainment
  • 平台: PSP
  • 平台: PS2
  • 游戏类型: TPS
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人
  • 发行日期: 2006年3月14日
